amendment.description: To strike the sections regarding Commission awards and representation and reception activities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4028 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4028 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Collins. (consideration: CR S4646; text: CR S4646) To strike the sections regarding Commission awards and representation and reception activities.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4028 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4028 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Collins.
